data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Sochi's half.
Sochi advance rapidly upfield but Vladislav Bezborodov blows for offside.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards Sochi a goal kick.
In the minute 8, In Sochi Sochi drive forward through Nikita Burmistrov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball safe as Sochi is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 9, Rubin Kazanâ€™s Oliver Abildgaard is on his feet again at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Oliver Abildgaard.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Joaozinho for Sochi is whistled offside.
In the minute 11, Vladislav Bezborodov awards the home team a throw-in.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Silvije Begic (Rubin Kazan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 13, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Sochi.
In Sochi, Carl Starfelt (Rubin Kazan) misses the target with a header.
Sochi have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?
Throw-in Sochi.
In the minute 17, Sochi have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick in a good position for Rubin Kazan!
In the minute 19, Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 20, Sochi to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Can Sochi capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rubin Kazan's half?
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 24, Miha Mevlja is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Miha Mevlja returns to the field for Sochi after picking up a slight injury.
Ivan Ignatyev for Rubin Kazan drives towards goal at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 26, Rubin Kazan drive upfield and Ivan Ignatyev gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Sochi defender.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Throw-in for Sochi close to the penalty box.
In the minute 29, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Sochi.
Rubin Kazan push forward at Fisht Olympic Stadium and Zurab Davitashvili gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Sochi defence.
In Sochi, Darko Jevtic of Rubin Kazan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 32, Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Joaozinho gets his shot on target but fails to score for Sochi.
In the minute 36, Corner awarded to Sochi.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Khvicha Kvaratskhelia for Rubin Kazan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 37, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sochi.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 38, Free kick Sochi.
Throw-in high up the field for Sochi in Sochi.
Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a throw-in for Rubin Kazan, close to Sochi's area.
Anton Zabolotnyi is on a sub for Dmitri Poloz for Sochi.
In the minute 41, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards the away team a throw-in.
Sochi needs to be cautious. Rubin Kazan have an attacking throw-in.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Ilya Samoshnikov (Rubin Kazan) gets a yellow card.
Sochi are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 44, Sochi's Joaozinho gets in a shot on goal at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
Sochi take a 1-0 lead thanks to Miha Mevlja.
In the minute 44, Joaozinho instrumental with a fine assist.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
The first-half is over.
The second half has started at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 46, Throw-in Sochi.
Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Sochi's half.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
In the minute 52, Can Sochi capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rubin Kazan's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
Sochi have a goal kick.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
Rubin Kazan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 58, Throw-in high up the field for Rubin Kazan in Sochi.
Leonid Slutskiy (Rubin Kazan) is making a first substitution, with Djordje Despotovic replacing Zurab Davitashvili.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 59, Important block from the Sochi defence as Darko Jevtic fires in a strike for Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan pushes forward through Djordje Despotovic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan close to the penalty box.
Oliver Abildgaard gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rubin Kazan.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Rubin Kazan's Ilya Samoshnikov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 66, Vladislav Bezborodov awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
The match is now all square at 1-1 thanks to a penalty from Ivan Ignatyev.
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Sochi.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
In the minute 72, Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Aleksandr Rudenko is replacing Joaozinho for the home team.
Sochi make their third substitution with Ivan Miladinovic replacing Elmir Nabiullin.
In the minute 73, The away team have replaced Soltmurad Bakaev with Denis Makarov. This is the second substitution made today by Leonid Slutskiy.
Sochi have a dangerous throw-in.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 75, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Vladislav Bezborodov.
In the minute 76, Sochi are whistled for offside.
Goal! Rubin Kazan have got their heads in front thanks to a Denis Makarov strike.
Great play from Khvicha Kvaratskhelia to set up the goal.
Throw-in Sochi.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Sochi.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Dmitri Tarasov is replacing Silvije Begic for Rubin Kazan at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 83, The home team replace Nikita Burmistrov with Akmal Bakhtiyarov.
Vladimir Fedotov is making the team's fifth substitution at Fisht Olympic Stadium with Emanuel Mammana replacing Ibrahim Tsallagov.
Rubin Kazan will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sochi.
In the minute 85, Christian Noboa grabs a goal to bring things level at 2-2 at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Sochi goal kick.
Rubin Kazan's Denis Makarov gets in a shot on goal at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 88, The away team replace Ivan Ignatyev with Igor Konovalov.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Vladislav Bezborodov signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Can Sochi capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Sochi.
Free kick Sochi.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
Vladislav Bezborodov awards Rubin Kazan a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sochi.
It's 3-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
Filip Uremovic (Rubin Kazan) has received a yellow card from Vladislav Bezborodov.
Sochi move into a 3-2 lead through a Ivan Miladinovic header.
That's a fine assist from Christian Noboa.
Emanuel Mammana (Sochi) has received a first yellow card.
